entries.description: UCIPD officers found the bodies of a man and a woman after what detectives believe to have been a murder-suicide.

entries.title: Mega Millions Numbers for 12/13/2022, Tuesday Jackpot Was $400 Million
entries.description: Mega Millions numbers for 12/13/2022, Tuesday jackpot was $400 million

entries.title: Film Shows Pelosi's Hope for 'Epiphany' as Jan. 6 Disintegrates Into Bedlam
entries.description: The HBO documentary "Pelosi in the House" aired Tuesday night, and covers everything from the speaker's religious upbringing to her 35 years in Congress.

entries.title: Tornado Crushes Louisiana Town, Rescue Begins as Storm Moves East
entries.description: A swath of tornadoes is working its way now through Louisiana and into the rest of the Deep South.

entries.title: Armed Protest at Christmas Drag Show Highlights Intensified LGBTQ Threats
entries.description: The extremist group that gathered outside a San Antonio theater hosting the drag performance made baseless claims that the show threatens children guests.

entries.title: Biden Law Creates Path to Overturning Gay Marriage Ruling, Ministry Boasts
entries.description: The president signed the Respect for Marriage Act into law on Tuesday following the bill's passage in the House last week.

entries.title: Cyndi Lauper Says 'Our Families Are Validated' as Biden Signs Marriage Act
entries.description: Cyndi Lauper and Sam Smith both performed at the White House Tuesday before President Joe Biden signed the Respect for Marriage Act into law.

entries.title: Massive March Madness Wager Could Net Furniture Tycoon a Cool $22 Million
entries.description: He's had huge losses and mammoth winnings on his previous bets.

entries.title: Mega Millions Jackpot at $400 Million With 12 Shopping Days Until Christmas
entries.description: Consumers could earn the boost they need during a holiday-spending season plagued by high interest rates and the rising cost of goods.

entries.title: Russia Could Launch Another 'Major Offensive' in Early 2023: Dmytro Kuleba
entries.description: The Ukrainian Foreign Minister said the country is making every effort to counteract a potential new offensive from Russia.
